<alert xmlns="urn:oasis:names:tc:emergency:cap:1.2">
  <status>Actual</status>
  <msgType>Alert</msgType>
  <scope>Public</scope>
  <note>Example of a message template 1</note>
  <info>
    <language>en-us</language>
    <category>Fire</category>
    <event>FRW</event>
    <responseType>Shelter</responseType>
    <urgency>Expected</urgency>
    <severity>Severe</severity>
    <certainty>Likely</certainty>
    <description>Fire Hazard</description>
    <instruction>Take Shelter</instruction>
   </info>
</alert>
fields.title: Message Template 1

  <scope>Public</scope>
  <note>Example of a message template 2</note>

    <language>en-us</language>
    <category>Geo</category>
    <event>AVW</event>
    <responseType>Evacuate</responseType>
    <urgency>Expected</urgency>
    <severity>Severe</severity>
    <certainty>Likely</certainty>
    <description>Geophysical Hazard</description>
    <instruction>Evacuate Immediately</instruction>
   </info>
</alert>
fields.title: Message Template 2

fields.content:
